    description => string (708) "Stay in the heart of Mumbai. Conveniently set in Mumbai, Hotel Anam provides...
    $value[0]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Mumbai.
Conveniently set in Mumbai, Hotel Anam provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Popular points of interest nearby include Hanging Gardens, Kamala Nehru Park and Mohd Ali Road. The accommodations features a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Anam include Girgaum Chowpatty Beach, Chor Bazaar and Girgaon Chowpatty Beach. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport Mumbai Airport, 9.9 mi from the accommodations.

    description => string (685) "Stay in the heart of Mumbai. Offering a la carte rooftop restaurant, Hotel K...
    $value[1]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Mumbai.
Offering a la carte rooftop restaurant, Hotel Kumkum is located in Mumbai. The Chowpatty Beach is 2.5 mi. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The beautiful Marine Drive is 2.5 mi, iconic Gateway of India is 5 mi and Juhu Beach is 16 mi. The Mumbai International Airport is 11 mi.

Rooms here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries. Extras include a fan.

At Hotel Kumkum you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a ticket service, luggage storage and dry cleaning.

The rooftop restaurant serves multi-cuisine. Room service is available.

    description => string (913) "Stay in the heart of Mumbai. Located in Mumbai, 0.7 mi from Girgaum Chowpatt...
    $value[7]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Mumbai.
Located in Mumbai, 0.7 mi from Girgaum Chowpatty Beach, Hotel Orient Regency features a terrace and views of the city. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodations features valet parking, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Orient Regency rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

The accommodations offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Orient Regency include Chor Bazaar, Mohd Ali Road and Girgaon Chowpatty Beach. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport Mumbai Airport, 9.9 mi from the hotel.

    description => UTF-8 string (963) "Stay in the heart of Mumbai. Hotel Krishna Palace Residency offers comfortab...
    $value[8]['description']
    Stay in the heart of Mumbai.
Hotel Krishna Palace Residency offers comfortable rooms located a 15-minute drive from commercial centers like Nariman Point and Cuffe Parade. It offers a health club, 2 restaurants and free parking.

Krishna Palace Residency Hotel is 14 mi from Chatrapathi Sivaji International Airport and a 5-minute walk from the local railway station. Dentzz Dental Care (Kemps Corner) is 2789 feet while Worli is 2.5 mi away from the property.

Spacious rooms are fitted with Wi-Fi access and satellite channels. They are equipped with a safe, mini-bar and tea/coffee making facilities. The private bathroom is large enough to accommodate a bathtub, and has a hairdryer and amenities.

A business center is available. The hotel also provides airport shuttle, concierge and laundry services.

Krishna Palace’s multi-cuisine restaurant offers a range of local and international dishes. There is also a vegetarian restaurant that offers Jain dishes.

      /**
* Retrieve the path component of the URI.
*
* The path can either be empty or absolute (starting with a slash) or
* rootless (not starting with a slash). Implementations MUST support all
* three syntaxes.
*
* Normally, the empty path "" and absolute path "/" are considered equal as
* defined in RFC 7230 Section 2.7.3. But this method MUST NOT automatically
* do this normalization because in contexts with a trimmed base path, e.g.
* the front controller, this difference becomes significant. It's the task
* of the user to handle both "" and "/".
*
* The value returned MUST be percent-encoded, but MUST NOT double-encode
* any characters. To determine what characters to encode, please refer to
* RFC 3986, Sections 2 and 3.3.
*
* As an example, if the value should include a slash ("/") not intended as
* delimiter between path segments, that value MUST be passed in encoded
* form (e.g., "%2F") to the instance.

* @see    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-2
* @see    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3.3
